org.hibernate.jpa.event.spi.jpa

Interface Callback

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityCallback, ListenerCallback

    public interface Callback
extends Serializable
    Represents a JPA event callback.
